The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is going to happen to them and may be worse than losing their lives. Unfortunately for Frank Avery, he gets caught up in something bigger than he could ever imagine, and realizes how hard it is to get out of some things once you are deep inside.
